title: 7ìž¥
code1:
SELECT DEPTNO
       , TRUNC(AVG(SAL),0) AS VG_SAL
       , MAX(SAL) AS MAX_SAL
       , MIN(SAL) AS MIN_SAL
       , COUNT(*)AS CNT 
FROM EMP
GROUP BY DEPTNO
ORDER BY DEPTNO DESC
code2:
SELECT JOB
       , COUNT(*)
FROM EMP
GROUP BY JOB
HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3
code3:
SELECT TO_CHAR(HIREDATE, 'YYYY') AS HIRE_YEAR,
       DEPTNO,
       COUNT(*) AS CNT
  FROM EMP
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(HIREDATE, 'YYYY'), DEPTNO;
code4:
SELECT CASE WHEN COMM IS NULL THEN 'X'
            WHEN COMM IS NOT NULL THEN 'O' 
            END AS EXIST_COMM
      , COUNT(*) AS CNT      
FROM EMP
GROUP BY CASE WHEN COMM IS NULL THEN 'X'
            WHEN COMM IS NOT NULL THEN 'O' 
            END
code5:
SELECT DEPTNO
       , EXTRACT(YEAR FROM HIREDATE) AS HIRE_YEAR
       , COUNT(*)AS CNT
       , MAX(SAL) AS MAX_SAL
       , MIN(SAL) AS MIN_SAL
       , SUM(SAL) AS SUM_SAL
       , AVG(SAL) AS AVG_SAL
FROM EMP
GROUP BY ROLLUP(DEPTNO, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM HIREDATE))
